system.descriptionText: -5 Strength, +5 Willpower. Gain Speak Language (Ship Dialect) Skill, and treat Navigation (Stellar) and Pilot (Spacecraft) as Basic Skils. When spending fate points, roll 1d10, on a 9 it is not lost. Suffer -5 to Fellowships to interact with non void-born humans. Zero/Low Gravity Environments are not Difficult Terrain, and you don't get space travel sickness.
